document.docTitle: Meligethes Audisio, Jelínek & Cooter, 2005, s. l.
document.masterDocTitle: New and little-known species of Meligethes Stephens, 1830 from China (Coleoptera: Nitidulidae)

mods:titleInfo.mods:title: New and little-known species of Meligethes Stephens, 1830 from China (Coleoptera: Nitidulidae)

heading.emphasis:
Check-list of
Meligethes
s. l. from China and neighbouring countries

subSubSection.paragraph: Species currently known for certain from China (including Taiwan) are in bold

1.
M. abditus
sp. nov. NE China
2. M. accentus Kirejtshuk, 1978 Middle Asia, Tadzhikistan
7. M. assamensis Kirejtshuk, 1980 N India , Assam

9.
M. atratus (Olivier, 1790)
Europe, Siberia, Altai Mts.

15.
M. bocaki
sp. nov. S China
18. M. brunnicornis Sturm, 1845 Europe, Middle Asia, Altai Mts.

21.
M. chlorocupreus
sp. nov. S China

J. Sahlberg, 1903 E Siberia, Mongolia , N Korea , NE China

Europe, Middle Asia, Siberia, Altai Mts.

sp. nov. S China

paragraph.taxonomicName: M. kasparyani Kirejtshuk, 1984 SE Siberia, NE
